title: ABANDONED city in America with NO LAWS | Yes Theory
description:
FOLLOW US ON INSTAGRAM: https://www.instagram.com/yestheory/

A few months ago we went to visit the incredible abandoned city called Slab City. It used to be a military base but hundreds of squatters came and made it their home. We went with our friend Justin Escalona and truly had a fascinating experience. We thought the place would be hostile and dangerous when in fact it was inviting and beautiful (in it's own way). Shout-outs to all the description readers out there you know we love you :)

CHECK OUT JUSTIN'S CHANNEL:
https://www.youtube.com/user/PlayTheGameFilms

The abandoned video on YouTube:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=otIU6Py4K_A

All music from Epidemic Sound. You can get your free 30 day trial here: http://share.epidemicsound.com/wFFbr 

Who are we? 
Yes Theory are four friends from four different countries who constantly seek discomfort in order to grow. Ammar, Thomas, Matt and Derin met in Montreal, Canada in the summer of 2015 and bonded over their shared desire to live a life that challenged and excited them. Fast forward to a year later, the team is now based out of Los Angeles, making a show on Snapchat Discover.

title: BECOMING SUPERHUMAN WITH ICE MAN - Wim Hof
description:
Find our clothing line Seek Discomfort here! http://seek-discomfort.com/yes-theory 

Spending 24 Hours with Wim Hof 2020:  https://youtu.be/rCYXM1Z0QVo

Dislaimer: The following features stunts performed either by professionals or under the supervision of professionals. Accordingly, the producers insist that no one try to recreate or re-enact any stunt or activity performed in this film.

We've admired the pioneering work of Wim Hof for years now from afar. This January however we got an opportunity to spend four days with him in the mountains of Poland. We didn't know what to expect. We had no idea that Wim was at a place in his life where he wanted to push his findings to the next level....we had no clue that we were his experiments in proving just how powerful the mind is.

If you want to learn more about Wim's method, go visit:
https://www.wimhofmethod.com

Thank you to Wim (@iceman_hof) and Enahm Hof (@enahm_hof) for making this possible and for letting us into their lives.

Thank you to our incredible producer Sky Cowans (@skycowans)  You can check out her amazing video on how this crazy adventure came together and more on her personal experience here: http://bit.ly/SkysVideo

Check out Colin and Samir's amazing BTS video!  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=enbVsRjRBSY

Thank you to the amazing men behind the camera who captured the whole thing, Andreas Hem (@andreeashem), Matt Komo (@mattjkomo) and Max Rantz-Macdonald (@livetothemax).

A huge thank you to our badass team of editors and partners who crunched this documentary down in 5 days...that shit is unheard of. Our very own Thomas Dajer (@thomasdajer) and Colin and Samir (@colinandsamir).

Everything you see here is an effort of love. Thank you for watching.

If you want to learn more about the Wim Hof breathing method this is a great tutorial: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nzCaZQqAs9I&t=4s

title: Traveling to the Least Visited Country in the World
description:
*BLACK FRIDAY DROP Out Now*: http://seek-discomfort.com/yes-theory 
This week only, with every purchase about $35, you'll get 2 free Seek Discomfort flags!

Do you know what the least visited country in the world is?! My experience there was incredibly surprising.

Get 2 months of Skillshare completely free by using this link!! https://skl.sh/yestheory16
Thank you to Skillshare for sponsoring this video! 

Yep, I travelled to what the internet deems the least visited country in the world. The reality is that the statistics behind this are far from perfect. Many of these small countries don't actually count how many people come visit. So it's very hard to really tell which country truly has the least visitors. Either way, I went to Tuvalu, which is somewhere in the bottom of the list... and my experience was shocking.

title: ABANDONED 5-STAR Prison Pablo Escobar Built For Himself (Revealed by Ex-Drug Dealer)
description:
We are huge fans of the show Narcos so while we were in Medellin, we had to get a tour of where some of the most intense days in Colombia history took place...Pablo Escobar's Prison, La Catedral, as well as the place he was killed. It was a surreal experience, but what made it even crazier was that our tour guide himself was involved in drug dealing in the past and had an inside look at what this life is like. Let us know what you thought of the episode!

Follow us on Instagram @yestheory for behind the scenes look at what we do :)

The Honey Hunters of Nepal have a 260 year-old tradition of scaling mountains in search for a rare honey only found in the Himalayas that makes people hallucinate. We travel to the depths of the country of Nepal in search for these brave people and capture their story.

These stories searching for some of the world's rawest and most authentic experiences is what I feel most excited about in this chapter of my journey as a story-teller. Super proud of this one, I hope you enjoy :)

title: Asking a Stranger to go on a Date across the World!
description:
Ammar is usually the one setting us up on dates, so now it was turn to go one. But it had to be different. It had to be spontaneous. So he went on Bumble, matched with an awesome girl named Tali and asked her if she'd go on a spontaneous trip across the world within 48 hours. The rest was the adventure of a lifetime :)

Every Friday we send you a 1-minute read on what we've learned from starting a business, seeking discomfort, and living a more fulfilling life:  http://yestheory.com/newsletter

title: I Hitchhiked the World's Deadliest Train (20hrs across the Sahara)
description:
Become smarter in 5 minutes by signing up for free today: http://cen.yt/mbyestheory - Thanks to Morning Brew for sponsoring today‚Äôs video.

üôèüèº Thank you for making these videos possible through your support of Seek Discomfort 
‚ö°Ô∏è SEEK DISCOMFORT: http://seek-discomfort.com/yes-theory

The Mauritanian Railway, one of the world's longest and heaviest train in the world transports iron ore from a remote mining town in Mauritania to a coastal city cutting through the Sahara Desert. The ride lasts anywhere between 19-30 hours and a few brave locals use it to travel back and forth with supplies. The dangerous trek leads to several unfortunate deaths every year as people fall off the train. Thomas and his friend Drew Binsky attempt to find this train and embark on the dangerous journey through the Sahara.

Thank you to Drew Binsky for coming with me and guiding me through how to travel in this part of the world! Check out his channel here:
https://www.youtube.com/user/thehungrypartier

Thank you to our local friend Med for some of the b-roll shots of the train.

title: Finding the Lost Largest Pyramid in the World
description:
Here is our second documentary. It‚Äôs a story about Ammar‚Äôs dream to climb the Pyramid of Giza and where that actually led him to...a dream he never knew he had, deep in the jungles of Guatemala. Thank you for those of you who supported the paywall for the past month, you made this doc and future ones possible for us. Thank you to all of you for supporting our dreams. Hope you enjoy the film now here on YouTube! 

This film was made with deep respect and love for our planet and all living things. No animals, flora, fauna (or people) were harmed in the making. 

Thank you to Presi, Gabriel and Mario for guiding us through this experience. You can find more about their company, Maya Cosmos Ascension, here https://www.guatemalascension.org

If you would like to learn more about the Maya Biosphere Reserve, and the conservation efforts underway in Guatemala, please go to https://www.rainforest-alliance.org/articles/guatemala-forest-concessions-global-conservation-model

THANK YOU! To all of these amazing creators. This was one of the best and most impactful trips we‚Äôve ever been on and a huge part of that is thanks to all of these amazing people that came along with us. Check all of these guys out, they are all worth following:

description:

title: I Spent a Day with Giants (World's Strongest Men)
description:
Thanks to NordicTrack for sponsoring a portion of this video! Click here to get $75 off your own NordicTrack with code YesTheory! https://tinyurl.com/ydlmtul2

Click here to download the iFIT app and get your 30-day free trial: https://www.ifit.com/appdownload

Thank you to the legendary Stoltman Brothers for hosting us up in Scotland! We had such a blast hanging out and getting to know them. They are such pure legends, pushing the limits of human strength and we can't wait to continue seeing them take over the world. You can check out their YouTube channel here!
https://www.youtube.com/c/StoltmanBrothers

Tom Stoltman is the current World's Strongest Man while Luke Stoltman, his older brother, is the current Europe's Strongest Man. These are the two biggest title in the sport making them not only the strongest brothers in the world but arguably the strongest men in the world. I hope you enjoy watching us spend a day trying to keep up with them..

title: 50 Hours In A Country That Doesn't Exist On A Map (Transnistria)
description:
Sign up for free: https://cen.yt/mbyestheory3 and become smarter in 5 minutes - Thanks to Morning Brew for sponsoring today‚Äôs video.
WE'RE BACK! Weekly uploads until December then every 2 weeks! We've been filming a lot recently, it's been crazy being able to do this again. We've got lots of life updates coming along with some of the most epic adventures to date.

On this trip, Eric and Thomas head to a country in Eastern Europe that doesn't exist that calls itself Transnistria.. Considered dangerous to travel to by some familiar with the region.. They decided to travel there without any itinerary and see what they find.

This idea was submitted to us by Nick Bowlby in our Creative Internship program we hosted last year! We had 6 people from the Yes Fam pitch ideas for us every week for a few months and lots of great things came out of that, including this one. So shout-out to the Yes Fam and Nick for getting us out to this strange and unique ‚Äúcountry‚Äù.

title: 7 DAYS IN SYRIA IN 2022
description:
A few months ago I had the privilege of being able to enter and see parts of western Syria. We went to see a few of the country‚Äôs major cities and ancient historical sights. Our trip was very emotionally challenging but also beautiful in many ways. Meeting Syrians, hearing their stories and capturing a small part of what the country looks like today was not a simple goal but one I hope you will enjoy joining me on. Sending lots of love to all of the Syrians of the world. Thank you for welcoming me and teaching me about your culture.

Thanks Ghaidaa for the best tour I could have possibly been on. If you want to follow her stories or travel with her, follow her on instagram at https://www.instagram.com/ghaidaa_the_guide/.

Thank you Touma for helping me capture this trip! He has just released a video about what living in Syria is like, so please go watch it here (https://youtu.be/O_-8a-8bRkE) and follow his Instagram https://www.instagram.com/toumabittar/.

Thanks Fadi for opening so many doors for us to be able to see parts of the country few have been able to for a long time. Check his work out here: https://www.instagram.com/fadiassigt/

title: Inside the World's Most Luxurious Abandoned City (never seen before)
description:
Thanks to Audible for sponsoring this episode. Go to http://www.audible.com/yestheory or text "yestheory" to 500 500 and start listening today!

Check out my friend @johnnyharris first story about this conflict here:
https://youtu.be/p7_TZagxjyk

Check out @nathanieldrew ‚Äòs Channel who joined us on this trip as well.

This was probably one of the most complicated stories we've ever had to tell. For my Cypriots watching, I wish you peace and prosperity for the future. I hope you enjoyed this piece and understand that not every single detail of the story could be highlighted. I could've spent hours going into all of the intricacies of this conflict and tried to stay balance and unbiased as I simply came an observer.

Varosha is one of the largest and most tragic ghost towns on the planet. Once filled with tens of thousands of tourists every year it's been abandoned now for about 47 years... The conflict in Cyprus is far from being resolved and unfortunately is growing in complexity as the years go by. Sending hope and positivity to all the Cypriots out there, thank you for hosting me in your country.

description:

title: I Lived with Wolves for 72 hours
description:
Our first ever connection card game SPARK by Seek Discomfort is OUT NOW!! ‚ö°Ô∏è http://seek-discomfort.com/yes-theory

We are so thrilled to take a serious step in the direction of enabling you who is currently watching to seek discomfort by connecting more deeply with those around you. From a stranger you just met, old friends or your family, SPARK is designed to both ignite a connection and give you ideas for adventures to go on together!

There are 200 questions and 200 ideas for adventures‚Ä¶ We cannot wait to hear about all of the connections and adventures that will get ignited through this game ‚ö°Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è ‚ö°Ô∏èLET‚ÄôS GO!!

WOLVES:
THANK YOU to Paula and Steve from Apex Protection Project for being such dedicated wolf savers. It is people like them who dedicate their lives to the service of others whether it be people or animals that help make our planet a better place.

They need help! With both donations or volunteering in person. You can find all the info you‚Äôll need for that here:
https://www.apexprotectionproject.org

These wolves were all abandoned by their owners as people continue to adopt them thinking having a wolf will be fun to have but it is an extremely time consuming and difficult task to raise one. Please do not contribute to this problem and instead go volunteer at a sanctuary and help them get protected in the wild.

To take action on a larger level, please take 5-10min to go to this website https://www.relistwolves.org it will give you all the info on who your legislator is, how to contact them, pre-written emails and everything you can do to help wolves, made as easy as possible for you.

This isn‚Äôt just about wolves however, it‚Äôs about all species on the planet and protecting our ecosystem. Let‚Äôs all do our parts to show we care.

title: 72 Hours With Strangers Who Have Seen Aliens
description:
A few months ago Ammar heard about an incredibly strange event in Massachusetts on September 1st 1969 where several people that didn‚Äôt know each other from the same town claim to have been abducted by aliens on the same evening. The story seemed so surreal and otherworldly that we had to go speak to the people directly... Here are their stories. What do you think?

The UFO monument park is in loving memory of the late, Dr Howard W. Reed.

title: Exploring Dubai‚Äôs Empty $13 Billion Man-Made Islands
description:
*BLACK FRIDAY DROP Out Now*: http://seek-discomfort.com/yes-theory 
This week only, with every purchase about $35, you'll get a Free Seeker necklace 

The World Islands. A collection of 300 man-made islands built off the coast of Dubai to resemble an outline of the EARTH FROM THE SKY‚Ä¶ Yet, after $13 billion was spent to complete them they‚Äôve mostly been sitting there empty... I couldn‚Äôt believe this place actually existed.

So as a first stop on my trip I flew to Dubai to understand what happened and what their future holds‚Ä¶ What are your thoughts? Amazing or too crazy of an idea?

Thank you to @MyDubai and @VisitDubai for helping us get in touch with the creators of these islands and for letting us go out to see the restricted areas.

title: Exploring the Paranoid Country with 374,142 Bunkers to Hide Everyone (how is this possible?)
description:
Going to therapy is a sign of strength, not weakness. The sponsor BetterHelp
makes therapy simple, with 10% off your first month to help you get started:
https://betterhelp.com/yestheory

Switzerland has had an unbelievable obsession with bunkers for decades that almost nobody knows about. We travel to the country to explore this little known side of the nation in a quest for answers and insight. Do you think they're doing the right thing? Or are they paranoid to a fault? Would you want your own country invest as much as they have into fallout shelters like this?

Thank you to @QuentinBuggia for having helped us capture this experience.

Who are we? 
We believe life‚Äôs greatest moments and deepest connections exist outside your comfort zone.

title: Dialling Random Numbers Until Stranger Agrees to Hang Out
description:
Get Honey for FREE: https://joinhoney.com/yestheory
 
Use Honey to save $$$ this holiday season at Amazon, eBay, J.Crew, Best Buy, Urban Outfitters, MVMT, and more

What would happen if you dialed a random number and convinced the person on the other end to hang out with you for a day? Who would possibly say yes to a request? And is that person someone you could trust?

We decided to find out for ourselves. And we quickly learned, once again, that the world is filled with kind, spontaneous and loving strangers. 

You just have to look around.

Thank you to Hannah for taking part in this adventure.

title: The NICEST girlfriend prank EVER | Yes Theory
description:
Our friend BC has fallen madly in love with his girlfriend Taylor and for a while now he‚Äôs been wanting to surprise her. So, BC recruited us to give her the best day ever, without her having any idea. What ensued were 7 amazing surprises and tears, lots of tears.

We use Zenly all the time to know where each of us are so we don't annoy each other with constant texts, which is why we asked them to help us out and sponsor this video. So stoked they made this happen! You can download their app here: http://m.onelink.me/904e9272

title: Convincing Strangers at Airport to Fly Somewhere Else with us...
description:
Go to https://www.seekdiscomfort.com/ for our last season of the year! If you order now you're guaranteed to receive it before the holidays. 

Now for this episode... A few weeks ago we received a comment from somebody challenging us to convince a stranger at an airport to travel somewhere different with us... description:

üôèüèº Thank you for making these videos possible through your support of Seek Discomfort 

I've been fascinated with Chernobyl since the moment I read about it in history class over 10 years ago. A few months ago I had the opportunity to go explore it after a big snowfall. The stories we heard were both heartbreaking and inspiring. So excited to finally be able to share.

Our friend Brendan North is Logan Paul's videographer and when he was going away for Thanksgiving, he asked if we'd be interested in covering for him. title: I Moved In With Ice Man For 24 Hours... (Wim Hof)
description:
Go to http://www.audible.com/yestheory or text yestheory to 500 500 and start listening today. We highly recommend listening to Wim's new book to get the perfect in-depth explanation of his method.
ICE MAN IS BACK!
*Do not try to replicate the same challenges we do in this video*. You can however experiment with the Wim Hof Method through Wim's App or by listening to his book on Audible! If you have any acute medical conditions, consult with your doctor beforehand.

Check out Zac's version of the video on his channel Zac and Jay!
https://youtu.be/h6GTPpR1fUI

After almost 2 years after our initial documentary with Ice Man (Wim Hof) in Poland... Thomas went back to see him for another crazy adventure.

The Wim Hof method really is an incredible way to reset your mind and body. The combination of breath-work and cold-exposure helps you tap into deeper, more meditative, parts of your brain and gain more control in  your every day life.

Here's the link to the original documentary if you haven't seen it!
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8cvhwquPqJ0

description:

We were not invited to any of the big Oscar parties so we thought we'd give a shot at crashing one in Beverly Hills. What we thought was going to be a casual adventure knocking on doors ended up being so much more. I hope you enjoyed watching this! We do not promote that anyone sneaks into parties without permission, we always do this with the best intentions and are always mindful of the hosts. If you do try, be kind!

title: SAYING YES TO A CRAZY INSTAGRAM DM (Flew to INDIA!!)
description:
Thank you to Skillshare for sponsoring this video. The first 500 people that sign up get the first 2 months for free: https://skl.sh/yestheory14 don't miss out!

We get crazy DM's on Instagram all the time, so this week we decided...what would happen if one of us said "Yes" to the first one we came across?  Thomas was chosen to go on this adventure and let's just say within 24 hours of accepting the challenge, he was on the other side of the world.

Thank you to @roshniwaliaa for the challenge and the incredible hospitality and thank you to the rest of the Yes Fam India for making this trip so unforgettable.

title: Asking Strangers To Tell Their Crushes They Like Them!!
description:
NATALIE TASHA'S CHANNEL: https://www.youtube.com/user/NatalieTashaThompson

Calling your crush and telling that person you like them is one of the hardest things in the world... It can be terrifying but also immensely rewarding. Even if it doesn't work out... At least you'll know. So we decided to go out in the streets and challenge some strangers... by asking them to call their crushes.. and tell them they like them. Enjoy!

Shout-out to Mikey Murphy for inspiring us to do this video!
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Rv_FKCk2vMY

title: ASKING BILLIONAIRE'S TO RIDE THEIR SUPERCARS!
description:
Being told no is often a blessing in disguise. There are an endless amount of supercars in London, so while we were there we wanted to get a ride in the most luxurious one we could possibly find. Who knew how many times we'd get denied and what that would lead to...

Yes Theory are four friends from four different countries who constantly seek discomfort in order to grow. Ammar, Thomas, Matt and Derin met in Montreal, Canada in the summer of 2015 and bonded over their shared desire to live a life that challenged and excited them. Fast forward to a year later, the team is now based out of Los Angeles, making a show on Snapchat Discover every Sunday on the Brother Channel.

Enjoy!

SHARE the love! And SUBSCRIBE for more.

description:

title: WE HELICOPTER BUNGEE JUMPED WITH WILL SMITH (over Grand Canyon)
description:
To see Will's Jump from his live-stream, checkout: https://youtu.be/7uilQxtVvpQ

https://www.seekdiscomfort.com/

After 6 months, it happened. 

From a dream Ammar had in his sleep to actually bungee jumping out of a helicopter with Will Smith. 

It FREAKING happened.

Over 25,000 of you commented on his channel when we put up the challenge and it led to this. Thank YOU, YES FAM.

There are so many incredible people to thank so here they are:

The Yes Theory squad that we wouldn't be able to do any of this with, Our in-house post-production guru leader, TD @thomasdajer, our badass manager Zack @zack.thecreator and Creative Director @gracie_norton. 

Andreas Hem, the best filmmaker we've ever met. He's directed, filmed and edited a lot of the footage you see here. You can find him on his incredible YouTube channel (youtube.com/andreasahem). Tell him we say hi :)

The family and friends that came with us to the jump: Colin and Samir, Helena and Fred Brag, and Tom.

Of course, thank you to Will Smith for accepting this challenge in the first place. Without him, none of this would have been possible. He is as incredible in person as he is on the screen. A true gentleman with a great heart.

Thank you to his team @WestBrook and Overbrook for helping us put this together.

Thank you to @YouTube for trusting us with this idea and organizing the whole live production.

Thank you to everyone at Fly On The Wall @flyonthewallent and our personal producer, Brian, for putting together such a smooth and outstanding event.

Thank you to the whole stunt team including TJ White @tminusproductions for keeping Ammar and Will safe throughout.

Thank you to Alfonso Ribeiro @therealalfonsoribeiro for hosting the live event so freaking well.

Thank you to Ala Stanford @dralastanford and her medical team for checking up on Ammar and Will to make sure their health was in the right condition for the stunt.

Thank you to the Navajo Nation for allowing us to do this on their land. What an honor it was to meet some of you who call this magical place home.

Thank you to @omazeworld and Global Citizen for helping us raise over $1 million for charity.

If you want to join the Yes Fam Facebook group which is 50,000+ of our most engaged and badass community members, you can apply here: https://www.facebook.com/groups/156535611858034/

Every Friday we send you a 1-minute read to over 100,000 of you on what we've learned from starting a business, seeking discomfort, and living a more fulfilling life. Sign up here, http://yestheory.com/newsletter

title: Exploring the Secret US Government Town with No Internet & Phone Service (100% Disconnected?)
description:
If you‚Äôre struggling, consider therapy with our sponsor. Click https://betterhelp.com/yestheory for a discount on your first month of therapy.

If you have questions about the brand relating to how the therapists are credentialed, their privacy policy, or therapist compensation, here is an overview written by the YouTube creators behind the channel Cinema Therapy that goes into these topics:  https://www.reddit.com/r/cinema_therapy/comments/1dpriql/addressing_the_betterhelp_concerns_headon_deep/

Welcome to Green Bank... Also called "The Quiet Zone" carved out within West Virginia, this is a hidden border where WiFi, Cellphone service.. even microwaves? Are illegal. We travel to this place to investigate further and see what we can find.

Thank you to Kate for joining us! Support Kate and her music here!!
https://www.instagram.com/feyfili/

Thank you to Jay Lockman for letting us into his fascinating world.

title: A Stranger‚Äôs Last 3 Months to Live
description:
When I met Xavier Romero in July of 2019, he'd been given 1 week left to live. He was suffering from a rare form of liver cancer and doctors had given up hope. After hearing his story, I knew I wanted to meet him. Little did I know Xavier would beat all the odds and that we would get to know each other and become brothers. 

Over three months of getting to know him, he taught me about what it means to fight for your life, to love unconditionally and to appreciate every single breath. He always wanted to start a YouTube channel and I told him that no matter what, his story would be told. He took comfort in that. Here is that story. 

I know he's here with us. I know he's watching this video and smiling at these beautiful moments we got to spend with each other. I miss him and I know I'll see him again one day. 

Thank you for watching. It means a lot to me and I know it means a lot to him.

Love,

Matt

title: STRANGERS go on an EPIC BLIND DATE for 24 HOURS
description:
Matt is always working behind the scenes on all of our different projects so we decided that we'd have him take a few days off and do something he's never done...go on a blind date. Except this was not just any blind date...it was the greatest one ever. And it all happened in Hawaii (Maui).

title: He Started a Country Inside the U.S. Nobody Noticed.
description:
Thanks to our friends at Gevalia for sponsoring this video! Use the code GEVALIA20 for 20% at checkout: http://bit.ly/yestheoryGEVALIA20

His "Excellency President Kevin Baugh" apparently started his own country inside the US called Molossia... We had to go see it to find out what it's all about.

As a note, you cannot just to go visit this place, you have to ask for permission first and get listed on the official tours they do. This usually only happens once a month a few months a year. Make sure you go on their website before you do anything and contact them for a tour :)

title: Traveling to a Country that was Closed for 40 Years
description:
For your chance to win a Zelectric Porsche 912 E and support a great cause, enter at https://omaze.com/YesTheory 

Thomas spent 7 days exploring around the countryside of Albania in the search for some of the abandoned bunkers left behind after the the communist dictator Enver Hoxha's brutal rule from the 1940's to the 1980's. Yet what we found after a few days was so much more than we'd originally come for. The nature, the kindness of the people and the rich history blew us away. We still left wondering what the future of these bunkers holds...

Check out Nathaniel's channel here!!
https://www.youtube.com/c/nathanieldrewofficial/videos

Thank you to Cory Martin for once again making the visuals in this story look INCREDIBLE:

title: World‚Äôs First Iron Man in Antarctica ‚Äì PROJECT ICEMAN (4K Full Film)
description:
Don‚Äôt forget to turn on cc/subtitles. The film is translated into 10 languages. 

Thanks to the 4,212 people in our community, representing 72 countries, who backed this film and allowed us to fund post-production and bring it to life.

Thanks to 6,500+ people attending all-sold-out premieres in 12 cities on 4 different continents.

And thanks to the thousands of you, who purchased the film online knowing that it will come out on YouTube for free, but still wanted to support the project.

You‚Äôve all enabled this historic release and allowed us to post it for free for everyone, everywhere around the world to enjoy without restrictions.

The film has won:
- Best Doc & Special Jury Award at Riviera International Film Festival 2023
- Best Doc at Rome Independent Film Awards 2023
- Best Picture & Best Doc at Los Angeles Film Awards 2023

About the film:
Project Iceman is the odyssey of an ordinary human setting out to achieve the extraordinary.

Anders Hofman attempts to become the first-ever human to complete a long-distance triathlon in Antarctica (3.8 km swim, 180 km bike, 42.2 km run), ‚Äúthe Iceman‚Äù, to show that limitations are perceptions.

In this death-defying journey, we witness how Anders conquers his fears, doubts, and adversities as he risks everything in one of the most extreme athletic feats ever attempted.

It‚Äôs a triumph of human potential and spirit, showing that we all can achieve anything we set our minds to.

A FILM BY YES THEORY

DIRECTED BY AMMAR KANDIL (Ammar)

VISION BY ANDERS HOFMAN
(Follow his next dream on https://www.instagram.com/andershofman ‚Äî find out what he‚Äôs doing now)

title: We Went to the Abandoned "Island of Death"... (ITALY)
description:
Go to https://yestheory.com/documentary/ to stay updated on our new documentary!

Check out Josh's video:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=d1swmz9_7VY

This week, Matt and I explored the island of Poveglia, one of the scariest and eeriest abandoned places we've ever been to. With over 160,000 deaths having taken place on the island, half of the island's soil is from human remains...

We had our travel hacker friend build a site to get the cheapest flights online. Book your next trip here! https://travel.yestheory.com/

title: TRAVELING ACROSS IRAQ FOR 7 DAYS (Kurdistan)
description:
üôèüèº Thank you for making these videos possible through your support of Seek Discomfort 
‚ö°Ô∏è SEEK DISCOMFORT: http://seek-discomfort.com/yes-theory

This week, I traveled to the beautiful country of Iraq.  All my life I'd heard of the war in Iraq and how dangerous it was to visit, but I wanted to go there and explore if for myself to hear the stories that didn't make it into the media.  So, along with Drew Binsky, Lexie Alford and Cory Martin, we were taken around Iraqi Kurdistan by our amazing guide, Baderkhan.

title: ASKING STRANGERS TO GET MATCHING TATTOOS!!
description:
Getting a tattoo is a big decision. Which is why convincing a stranger to do it with you sounds like it would be impossible. We decided to go out in the streets and try to make that happen. Little did we know just how many people would be so spontaneous :)

The people an Ink Monkey Tattoo kindly kept the shop open for us and they're so incredibly nice and professional, so if you get a tattoo in LA, these guys are dope: https://www.theinkmonkey.com/

title: I Bought a Citizenship That Can Travel the World
description:
We understand that monetarily this is not a decision every can take. But if anyone else is in fact interested we highly recommend working with Brookes & Partners, the same company we used. They were efficient and knew the process front and back. Check them out here:

title: 96 Hours in the World‚Äôs Coldest City (-64¬∞C,-84 ¬∞F)
description:
Become our partner here: https://www.theicemanfilm.com

Come learn more about why we chose NFTs here: https://youtu.be/V7oPEt67gOM

Mission: Create the most impactful documentary to ever be created on YouTube, share it in movie theaters with the world and win an Oscar for it. 

This has been a long time coming. The journey which started in 2018 with a daring goal to complete the first ever long distance triathlon in Antarctica in 2020 is now coming to its concluding chapter by releasing Project Iceman Film to the world this summer in exclusive premieres around the world and on YouTube at the end of the year. 

Thank you Drew Binsky for letting me tag along on this very special experience. Check out his video about this experience here: https://youtu.be/7AqAs0YizkY

Project Iceman Credits:

Director: Ammar Kandil 
Field director: Cory Martin 
Director of Photography: Jan Laumark 
Cinematographers: Nicklas Nagel, Herman Berger, Cory Martin, Jan Laumark 
Post Production: Burning Boat

title: Using TINDER to Live in Europe FOR FREE | Yes Theory
description:
Song by "Sur La Planche" by La Femme

It was Ammar's first time in Europe, and it was our most ambitious episode yet. Using only Tinder to find locals, we relied on the generous strangers to give us shelter, food, and a night out.

A very big thank you to every kind soul who helped us along the way.

Yes Theory are four friends from four different countries who constantly seek discomfort in order to grow. Ammar, Thomas, Matt and Derin met in Montreal, Canada in the summer of 2015 and bonded over their shared desire to live a life that challenged and excited them. Fast forward to a year later, the team is now based out of Los Angeles, making a show on Snapchat Discover every Sunday on the Brother Channel.

Enjoy!

title: The ONLY PERSON allowed to climb the GREAT PYRAMID OF GIZA
description:
This is part 2 of our Egypt Series where we tell the story of how Ammar became the first person in the world with the legal permit to climb the last standing Ancient Wonder of the World, the Great Pyramid of Giza. title: The 12-Hour Race That Almost Killed Me...
description:
Matt takes on one of the toughest endurance events on the entire planet, the Ironman. The Ironman consists of a 2.4-mile (3.86 km) swim, a 112-mile (180.25 km) bicycle ride and a marathon 26.22-mile (42.20 km) run, raced in that order and without a break.   

Thank you to Andreas Hem, the best filmmaker we've ever met. He filmed a lot of the footage you see here. You can find him on his incredible YouTube channel https://www.youtube.com/user/AndreasAHem

title: Abandoned Paranormal MOTEL (Military Junkyard FOUND) ft. George Janko
description:
All music from Epidemic Sound: http://share.epidemicsound.com/wFFbr 

Check out and subscribe to our friend George Janko:
https://www.youtube.com/georgejanko

As well as the amazing photographer Brendan North, all the drone footage was shot by him!
https://www.youtube.com/brendannorth

So over the week-end we head out to the desert of California with our friends George Janko and Brendan North. We had heard of this mysterious abandoned motel on the way to Las Vegas which was rumored to be haunted by it's previous owners... We don't believe in paranormal activities or that spirits can inhabit a place but this time.. We might have been proven wrong.

We do NOT advise that you go visit this place and we do not promote trespassing by any means. Be very careful anytime you go to an abandoned place as they can be highly dangerous.

Who are we? 
Yes Theory are four friends from four different countries who constantly seek discomfort in order to grow. Ammar, Thomas, Matt and Derin met in Montreal, Canada in the summer of 2015 and bonded over their shared desire to live a life that challenged and excited them. Fast forward to a year later, the team is now based out of Los Angeles, making a show on Snapchat Discover.

title: I'm Leaving YouTube
description:
üìù Follow Matt‚Äôs Newsletter: https://mattdajer.substack.com/

After five and a half years as a host on this channel, I've decided to step away. 'Thank You' are the only two words I can muster. You, this community, have shown me nothing but endless love and support. The video goes into detail about my decision.

I'll be writing a short newsletter twice a month at www.yestheory.com/newsletter. This is the newsletter I wish my 19 year old self had when I first set out to live a fulfilling life. When you sign you'll receive lessons, tips and tricks from ten years of seeking discomfort.

I'll also be working on the book which will come out in November of this year...but more on that later.

Come follow along on the ride. We're only just getting started :)

Also, make sure to wait till the end to watch our EPIC season trailer. 

Love you all,

Matt

description:
Hi friends, it would mean the world if you supported our ability to keep making videos like this one and our fundraising efforts here through Seek Discomfort's new drop live now:

Thanks to our fantastic guide and friend Aya Salih @aya__0_0/@safraty__ for making that trip so memorable. Don't hesitate to reach out to her if you ever want to travel to Baghdad. 

Then just a note from Thomas here, I am super grateful and humbled to have the ability to create and share stories like this one. I know this isn‚Äôt the most algorithm-optimized, easy to consume, but I do feel that we need more stories like this more than the mindless YouTube challenge content. So I do hope it resonates with you and that it can, as I say in the video, build a bridge or plant a seed for empathy within us. I appreciate any and all of your support whatever it looks like from liking, commenting or buying some Seek, all of it goes a lot further than you can imagine. title: ASKING MY CRUSH TO FLY TO PARIS FOR DREAM DATE
description:
Hope you enjoyed watching something a little different.. I haven't been this vulnerable and felt so nervous making a video before but here it is... Lana's Instagram: @LanaBlakely and Thomas: @ThomasBrag

Thank you to Norwegian Airlines for being so convenient and letting us book Lana a ticket last second. Love ya 

If anyone out there is struggling with a heartbreak or has become closed off emotionally for whatever reason... Just realize that the first step out of it is to start trusting again. I hope this video can maybe inspire some of you out there to realize that it does get better and that you cannot let your fears make you miserable forever. So go out there and choose love over fear my friends.

title: Turning our Backyard into the #1 Restaurant in Los Angeles!! (Rated 5-Stars on Google)
description:
Yes Table ended up reaching 11,500 5 star reviews on google maps after the episode went live on the channel. google took it down after 3 months for not being a ‚Äúreal restaurant‚Äù üòÇ

title: 30 Days to Overcome the Biggest Challenge of my Life
description:
The last Seek Discomfort drop of 2018 has just launched! 

Get yours here: https://www.seekdiscomfort.com

Order it now to:
1. Have a chance to be picked to make an episode with us where we help you achieve your biggest dream 
2. Get it before the holidays.

For the past 4 years Matt has put 'Completing a Half Ironman' on his list of biggest goals. But he's always put it off due to fear and procrastination. Until now, where, along with his friend Conor, he overcomes endless doubt, fear, uncertainty and lack of training to go compete head on in a race that once seemed impossible to him...all with only 30 days of training.

Special people to thank for making this episode happen:

Conor for always being down for the most insane challenges. Check out his YouTube channel here: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC1E5Ti2P70zZxA4osS2MhiA

Rich Roll for being both an inspiration and mentor throughout this whole process. Check out his YouTube channel here: https://www.youtube.com/user/richroll66/videos

Rich also has a great podcast which you can find here: https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/the-rich-roll-podcast/id582272991?mt=2)

Gina Baski and the whole Trifit team for teaching Matt the essentials and allowing him to train in their incredible gym. Visit https://trifitla.com/ to train for your triathlon.

Fuji Bikes @fujibikes for supplying both Conor and Matt with their bike. 

@andreeashem for the epic cinematography 

Thank you to @itsnicoyeager for lending us his drone for the day!

Who are we? 
Yes Theory are four friends from four different countries who constantly seek discomfort in order to grow. Ammar, Thomas, Matt and Derin met in Montreal, Canada in the summer of 2015 and bonded over their shared desire to live a life that challenged and excited them. Fast forward to a year later, the team is now based out of Los Angeles, making a show on Snapchat Discover.

title: Asking Strangers to Throw a Party at their House
description:
Make sure to check out Colin and Samir:
https://www.youtube.com/colinandsamir
and Jack Coyne:
https://www.youtube.com/jackcoyne

Would you let a stranger throw a party at your house? Well.. With our friends Jack Coyne, Colin and Samir, we decided to put that to the test and see if we could convince someone to let us host a dinner party at their house.. That we would then invite only strangers to. Seems like a crazy idea right? Well... Watch to see where it took us.

Special love for those who read the description... Have a beautiful day y'all - Thomas

title: LETTING A DICE CONTROL OUR LIVES FOR 24 HOURS
description:
Special thanks to @newbalance for challenging us, letting us take their athlete on an adventure, and being great sports along the way. #NBHeat

One of the most uncomfortable things you can do is let an inanimate object control your life. It's all based on randomness, and that's the reason we chose a dice. Ammar and Thomas got to take along New Balance Lacrosse star, Trevor Baptiste, while Matt spent time in Trevor's world as a lacrosse player. Along the way of course, strangers became a part of the whole adventure. Enjoy!

Big thank you to our friends and amazing filmmakers Colin and Samir for helping us out. Go check out their channel here: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCamLstJyCa-t5gfZegxsFMw

title: Surviving the Hottest Place in the World
description:
Go to http://www.audible.com/yestheory or text yestheory to 500 500 to get one free audiobook, unlimited Audible originals and a 30-day free trial
New Seek Discomfort Summer Drop: https://www.seekdiscomfort.com/ live for only 72hrs!

This week after Death Valley hit the hottest temperature ever recorded... We decided to go and experience what 130F or 56C felt like... Both the best and worst idea we've ever had.

Does anyone read the description? I never really know to be honest. Well either way, this is Thomas and I'm a bit bored writing this so I'll just keep typing random things and see if anybody will notice. Conor was really upset that we kept him farting in the video so please ignore that part (or don't). Anyways, hope you liked the video we're actually pretty stoked with how it came out!

Check out Conor's channel here and tell him we sent you it'll make him very happy!
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC1E5Ti2P70zZxA4osS2MhiA

Thank you to Tommy, Tristan and Nathan for tagging along as our rescue team.

title: Throwing a Party for Strangers from the Internet!! (Craigslist,Tinder and Bumble)
description:
This all started with a question: can you trust strangers you meet on Craigslist?

Thank you to Sweet Green for providing the freshest food for the party. Make sure you try them out whenever you‚Äôre near one!

People are generally wary of strangers they meet online. Whether it's on craigslist or any dating app or website. So we decided to fight that fear by throwing a party for only strangers we connect with online. What happened next was a total surprise to all of us. Enjoy.

title: Surviving the Deadliest Military Training on Earth (Arctic Snow Soldiers)
description:
Take back your personal data with Incogni. Use code YESTHEORY at the link below and get 60% off an annual plan: http://incogni.com/yestheory

Thank you to the Finnish Arctic Forces for bringing us into their world and trusting us in being essentially the first outsiders to ever capture a part of their training. title: Sneaking into Exclusive Hollywood Movie Premieres!! (Crashed LaLa Land!)
description:
You'll never believe how we managed to sneak our way into the hollywood premieres for this years biggest movies - La La Land and Arrival! You'll have to watch and see if we get to meet Emma Stone and Ryan Gosling.

What should we try next?! 

Yes Theory are four friends from four different countries who constantly seek discomfort in order to grow. Ammar, Thomas, Matt and Derin met in Montreal, Canada in the summer of 2015 and bonded over their shared desire to live a life that challenged and excited them. Fast forward to a year later, the team is now based out of Los Angeles, making a show on Snapchat Discover every Sunday on the Brother Channel.

title: Why I Can't Go Home for 7 Years
description:
Newsletter link: https://www.yestheory.com/newsletter/

Hi everyone, we know there's been a sad tone on our channel this week but rest assured... On Tuesday we're back with sneaking in, wheel of discomfort and adventures with strangers... It's going to be NUTS! We just had to get these two stories out.

This situation with Ammar in Egypt is very complicated, we hope you understand the situation and appreciate TD's amazing piece at the end. Some of you might not agree with Ammar's decision to stay in the U.S. but at the end of the of day, it's his and his only. Having this emotional weight over our shoulders while traveling in Egypt did make it harder to focus on videos sometimes but it was a trip that was necessary for us all.

The Super 8-effect and music choice was completely inspired by Adrian Bliss and his amazing piece:

title: I lived on the streets of LA for 48 hours
description:
What would you do if you lost everything? Ammar decides to live on the streets of LA for 48 hours in hopes gain a better appreciation for the simple things that he takes for granted in life.

All proceeds from this video will go to http://www.safeplaceforyouth.org to provide care and support to youth experiencing homelessness.

* Ammar was by no means trying to simulate homelessness or pretend like he knows what being homeless feels like, he was just trying to deprive himself of everything and see how he'd handle it.

title: Asking Subscribers to Drive Us Across Europe!!
description:
2 Month Free Trial for the 500 people that sign-up to Skillshare: http://skl.sh/yestheory8

Thomas and Matt somehow ended up in Saarbr√ºcken, Germany and needed to get back to Budapest, 1,100 km away. They decided to get some of our subscribers to join them and roadtrip across Europe. Marteen and Eric picked them up and soon enough, they were off on the adventure of a lifetime. Thank you to these two incredible dudes for taking us all the way in their smart car and thank you to all the incredible new friends we made who hosted us and took us on adventures. We'll cherish this memory forever. Thank you for watching and for being a part of this community.

Speaking of which, if you want to join the Yes Fam Facebook group which is 45,000 of our most engaged and badass community members, you can apply here: https://www.facebook.com/groups/156535611858034/

title: VACATION with my EGYPTIAN INSTAGRAM CRUSH *cringe alert*
description:
This is part 3 of our series in Egypt where we surprise Thomas with his Egyptian Instagram/Celebrity crush... Salma Abu Deif. Enjoy the episode! You can follow her on Instagram here: https://www.instagram.com/salmaabudeif

title: SAYING YES TO RUNNING A MARATHON WITH NO TRAINING - Is it possible?
description:
Get your free audible trial for a month + 1 credit for a free book: https://www.audible.com/yestheory   or   text "yestheory" to 500-500

Born to Run by Christopher McDougall changed my life and I can guarantee it will change yours. Go get audible and download that book. Please let me know if you have any questions or feedback @ammarxz on instagram. 

Ammar has struggled with discipline and focus for his whole life, so a few months ago he decided to sign-up to a marathon to force himself to train and run everyday. But as the weeks went by, his mental health deteriorated and he failed to train. He almost gave up on the marathon but 3 days before it was happening... Something incredible happened, he changed his mind and decided to chase the impossible.. Run a marathon without having trained.

title: We Flew The Most Dangerous Helicopter in the World
description:
www.seekdiscomfort.com 
Season 5 of Seek Discomfort is LIVE for only 72 hours!! 

Before the helicopter bungee jump with Will Smith on his 50th birthday, happening September 25th, we decided that Thomas and Matt would partake in a risky stunt of their own. Needless to say it was the experience of a lifetime.

title: WE CRASHED A STRANGER'S WEDDING
description:
HI! So‚Ä¶ If you are the couple in this video watching this‚Ä¶ First of all we‚Äôre sorry! If you scroll our channel you‚Äôll see it‚Äôs all about positivity‚Ä¶ So to give back to you‚Ä¶ Watch until the very end we have a gift for you! Much love.

Now to our viewers! We hesitated posting this crazy experience for a while since we felt more intrusive than we had wished even though Matt tried so hard to make people dance!!

Obviously we don‚Äôt encourage you to do this, it was honestly pretty scary and there‚Äôs more fun parties with less stakes to sneak into :) Much love to you all!!

Who are we? 
Yes Theory are four friends from four different countries who constantly seek discomfort in order to grow. Ammar, Thomas, Matt and Derin met in Montreal, Canada in the summer of 2015 and bonded over their shared desire to live a life that challenged and excited them. Fast forward to a year later, the team is now based out of Los Angeles, making a show on Snapchat Discover.

title: Inside a Secret Underground Society
description:

This idea originated from our friend @LexieLimitless , the youngest person to travel to every country who also joined us on the trip. Her travel adventure videos are incredible highly recommend checking out her channel here! https://youtube.com/c/LexieLimitless

This was definitely one of the strangest experiences we‚Äôve ever had. Traveling to the Damanhur community in Italy and being allowed to come document their world was a confusing and fascinating experience leaving us with more questions than answers. So we hope that you take everything in here with a big grain of salt. We got very close to not posting this story and feel we did our best to see represent our experience. Enjoy the ride‚Ä¶

title: BEST OF YES THEORY 2018 - Rewind Of Our Year
description:
What's your first baby step going to be?
Here's our Rewind of the best moments from the Yes Theory family this year.
Only 2 more weeks of Seek Discomfort available: https://www.seekdiscomfort.com/

This has been the most emotional and educational year of our life. We learned so much about ourselves, what it takes to run a YouTube channel and saw our dream come to life... But the truth is, this is just the beginning for us, and we're so excited to have you along for the ride.
It felt important to us to take some time to reflect on the year and create a piece that expressed what we learned this year. I hope you enjoy.

title: Spinning The Globe & Flying Wherever It Lands (again)
description:
SEEKER'S DAY LIVE NOW: 40% OFF EVERYTHING, NEW DESIGNS, GIFTS WITH PURCHASE.. What are you waiting for?? International: https://www.seekdiscomfort.com Europe: https://eu.seekdiscomfort.com/

Today is the start of Seeker's Day, live for the next 7 days we are celebrating the 9-year miracle of all the strangers, subscribers and adventures that have defined what Yes Theory is today. As Seek Discomfort has been the heartbeat of Yes Theory for the last 6 years, we are making it more accessible and affordable than ever before. It's been an unusually challenging time for us despite having had a blast on all of these recent adventures, so feeling the community's support this week would mean more than you know.

We‚Äôre now partners with our favorite hotel in the world, CitizenM. Check them out here: https://shorturl.at/9wa1W

title: Introvert Abandoned with No Money in Thailand for 24 Hours!!
description:
For all you introverts out there, this one's for you.

Be one of the first 500 people to sign up to get access to 2 months of Skillshare for free: https://skl.sh/yestheory7

Here is TD's Instagram:
https://www.instagram.com/thomasdajer/

Our editor, TD, is an introvert. He's a badass who just happens to like his own space and his own close-knit group of friends. So, we wanted him to experience some discomfort while were in Bangkok. With no money and no connections, he had to survive in the city for 24 hours. And all we can say is that we're damn proud of him for getting it done and proving to himself that he can do it.

Every Friday we send you a 1-minute read on what we've learned from starting a business, seeking discomfort, and living a more fulfilling life:  http://yestheory.com/newsletter

title: Abandoned Alone in an African Tribe
description:
Want to join us on an adventure next year? http://seek-discomfort.com/yes-theory 
Here's the deal.. After Ammar took Seekers on adventures this year and also sponsored Nelly Attar to climb K2, I would like to also say thank you to those who support us through Seek Discomfort this holiday by taking a small group of 3 of you who purchase from Seek this Holiday on an adventure somewhere next year. We will contact the 3 adventurers by January 31st. If you have already purchased this holiday, you're already good to go :) if you'd like a chance to join me, you know where to go! ‚ö°Ô∏è ‚ö°Ô∏è ‚ö°Ô∏è 

üôèüèº Thank you for making these videos possible through your support of Seek Discomfort

When it comes to what happened at the end.. It really shook me, we felt with the local team that we'd really prepared the best we could but sometimes unexpected problems like this one can happen. We've checked several times and everyone there is fine, they were really just looking for me. Nothing like this had really happened before even though I have experience traveling to Afghanistan, Iraq, Syria, Mauritania and I understand that there are things you can and cannot do. I went home after this trip to mentally recuperate and recharge.

//

title: Why I'm Leaving Yes Theory
description:
Because of his visa situation, Derin has to leave Yes Theory :(

But this has only fired us up even more. Our back's against the wall and we're only gonna take things to the next level.

Merch: https://www.fanofafan.co/collections/yes-theory-merch

Follow us on twitter for those exclusives! www.twitter.com/yestheory

Subscribe to our newsletter to figure out our secrets, what we've learned and what we think you should know: www.yestheory.com/newsletter

If you want to support us, we have merch and we'd really appreciate if you gave it a look :) https://www.fanofafan.co/collections/yes-theory-merch

All music from Epidemic Sound. You can get your free 30 day trial here: http://share.epidemicsound.com/wFFbr

title: Dark Secrets Hidden in America‚Äôs Most Isolated Islands
description:
Go to https://surfshark.com/yestheory or use code YESTHEORY at checkout to get 4 extra months of Surfshark VPN!

Thank you as always to our friend  ‚Å®@CorySMartin‚Å©  for capturing this in the magical way he always does, follow his work on Instagram as well:
https://www.instagram.com/cory.s.martin

Welcome to the Northern Mariana Islands. The American islands nobody has ever heard of, yet with some of the most interesting history and culture we've ever found within the US. So much to explore here, so many stories to tell. We travel there while having absolutely no idea where this adventure would take us, and boy were we in for surprises. This story and this series is one of the more ambitious and unique ones we've ever captured, so we truly hope that they click with you as much as we enjoyed making them. If you're here reading this btw, hi this is Thomas.. what was your favorite part of the video? Let me know you read this in the comments.. title: What Happened To Us
description:
Hey everyone. The past few months, just like for much of the world, have been really challenging for us. We didn‚Äôt really feel like we could share what was happening because we knew so many people around the world were having a harder time than we were. But making videos like usual and finding the strength to stay positive has been really hard as we‚Äôre also trying to figure out what we want for the future of this channel.

At this point in time there are still things we‚Äôre sorting out but we‚Äôre getting amped to come back to YouTube and start creating again!!

title: KIDNAPPING STRANGERS FOR 24 HOURS | Yes Theory
description:
Thank you for watching this crazy adventure! SUBSCRIBE if you want more!

We've been wanting to kidnap a group of strangers (consensually of course!) to test people's spontaneity for a long time. We're super pumped to have finally gone through with it! We know most of you probably won't believe that they actually agreed to put these paper bags on their heads but... neither did we in the beginning!!

Starting on 3rd street promenade in Santa Monica we went on a crazy adventure... Hope you enjoy!!

Thank you Isabel and Luis for being such a good sport!

Thank you to York from iflyheli make sure you follow him on instagram @iflyheli !

Thank you to the "Best Friends Animal Society's NKLA Pet Adoption Center." Go check them out! NKLA.org/adopt

Yes Theory are four friends from four different countries who constantly seek discomfort in order to grow. Who are we? 
Yes Theory are four friends from four different countries who constantly seek discomfort in order to grow. title: At The Ukrainian Border
description:
Additionally to the roughly $600,000 raised (now at $810,000), 100% of the ad revenue from this video will be donated to organizations helping refugees around the world.

To be a part of future humanitarian relief efforts please click here: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSeHEb1J0_D2REjGNi9f06zRldOETvu6saIIxKSd7unxgqPQvA/viewform

Here‚Äôs the link to the gofundme: https://www.gofundme.com/f/yvnh63-immediate-aid-to-ukrainian-refugees?member=17713623&sharetype=teams&utm_campaign=p_na+share-sheet&utm_medium=social&utm_source=whatsapp

www.TeamUkraineLove.com 

Special thanks to Max Rantz-Mcdonald (@livetothemax), AJ Forsythe (AJ__Forsythe) and Summer Vaughn (@sumsumofficial) for being the first to arrive in Poland to set up the infrastructure to this operation. 

To Benjamin Ortega for helping us capture this story and for going to the border with Ammar.  (@BenjaminOrtega) 

Kuba @_10kuba for helping us with create and manage our office space at CIC Warsaw @cic_warsaw, that to this day is where our operation runs. 

Nadia @nadjowa for using her connections with McDonald‚Äôs that resulted in 1950 meals delivered.

Y @magicofy for connecting so many dots and doing an amazing magic performance for kids at the refugee center. 

Victoria @vicky.umanska for being the backbone of our operation. She‚Äôs helped us direct our energy and resources at the right places since day 1 of us arriving.

To all of our Team Ukraine Love volunteers - Sumeyra, Josh, Zeynep, Duane, Olivia, Annie, Zoheir, Ece, Daria, Paul, Ola, Kutay

And to our global Yes Fam Community that enabled this whole operation and helped us raise close to 600,000 dollars. We love you and are grateful to be a part of this family. 

Love Over Fear, 
Yes Theory

title: 100 Hours in Europe's Most Corrupt Country
description:
Get an exclusive 15% discount on Saily data plans! Use code YESTHEORY at checkout. Download Saily app or go to https://saily.com/yestheory

After finding out Azerbaijan was Europe's most corrupt country, we decided to travel there to learn more about the humans living in that country. A place filled with lots of controversies but also lots of beauty, we arrive with no translator seeking to make some new friends to head out on an adventure at the heart of this mysterious nation.

title: We Threw A Wild Party With No Money!!
description:
All music from Epidemic Sound: http://share.epidemicsound.com/wFFbr 

We wanted to throw the world's greatest party without spending any money. We managed to get an artist, food, drinks, and venue all through the generosity of strangers.

Thank you to Dave from the Buried Life for the amazing SPEECH! He does comedy as well on Facebook. You guys should all go check him out! https://www.facebook.com/daveandalexia/?ref=br_rs

Thank you again to the following people:
Boogie (@ws_boogie)
Winston House (@winstonhouse)
Three Weavers Brewery (@threeweavers)
Whole Foods (@wholefoods)
House Beer (@HouseBeer)
DK Doughnuts (@krispykreme)
Chomp Eatery (@chompeatery)
Kye's 


Who are we? 
Yes Theory are four friends from four different countries who constantly seek discomfort in order to grow. Ammar, Thomas, Matt and Derin met in Montreal, Canada in the summer of 2015 and bonded over their shared desire to live a life that challenged and excited them. Fast forward to a year later, the team is now based out of Los Angeles, making a show on Snapchat Discover.

title: I Meditated Every Day For 1,000 Days Straight. Here‚Äôs What It Did!!
description:
The 60 day Headspace free trial has ended, but you can still take advantage of an extended 30 day free trial here: https://headspace-web.app.link/e/YesTheory30

‚ö°Ô∏è Shop the 'You are not alone collection': http://seek-discomfort.com/yes-theory
üôèüèº10% of proceeds from this collection go to supporting mental health through Active Minds 

Thanks to Headspace for partnering with us on 100 Days of Meditation 

Participate in the challenge by posting on instagram using #100daysofmeditation and tagging @YesTheory and @Headspace 

Hi there, Thomas here. First of all, thank you for watching this piece. This was quite of a different style of video and personal story, but after having told stories about seeking discomfort 6 years and not addressed the importance of meditation as a part of that journey, I felt compelled to finally share this with you all. I truly do believe in the power of meditation. I hope that all of you watching it will slowly make it a part of your mental diet and to bit by bit, make progress towards a more peaceful you ‚ù§Ô∏è Thank you to Headspace for supporting this video, normally, Headspace free trials are 7-14 days, so this is really special. #headspacepartner

title: We Took Our Taxi Driver to His Dream Destination (Full Movie)
description:
Get an exclusive 15% discount on Saily data plans! Use code YESTHEORY at checkout. Download Saily app or go to https://saily.com/yestheory

If this story moved you, then please consider helping us free reg from his debilitating (unjust) debt:  https://www.gofundme.com/f/help-reg-pay-off-his-debt

Every share or contribution, no matter the size, will make a difference. 

Thanks to all the incredible humans who‚Äôve helped us make this experience possible for King Reg:

Our favorite hotel in the world, CitizenM. Check them out here: https://www.citizenm.com?utm_source=youtube&utm_medium=social&utm_campaign=ch:BRC-l:EN-ct:organic-cmc:2024_yestheory-ym:2025_03&utm_content=a:social_video13

Jamey and Deepak for connecting us with @lupoyachtclub (yacht experience in Miami) 

@Joneil.gutierrez for connecting us with @drseanpaul (Ferrari ride in Austin) 

@terryblacks_bbq for incredible bbq experience 

@buggybarnmuseum for turning Reg into a movie star

Chris for the comfortable and luxurious rides around NYC @zelanzy_transport 

@tudorcitysteakhouse for the presidential treatment 

@flynyon for always helping us pull off the greatest moments of joy and bliss for people above NYC 

The best limo we‚Äôve ever been in: https://www.nycitylimo.com

Chef @mattia_ranca & chef @lfcro at @elevenmadisonpark for the best culinary experience of our lives 

And finally @citizenM for being our home away from home everywhere we go Check them out here: https://shorturl.at/9wa1W



Episode Background:
Two years ago, we met a humble London taxi driver named Reg who unknowingly left a lasting impression on us. He had spent his entire life working 7 days a week, and never once asking for anything in return.

So we made a promise... that one day, we‚Äôd take him on the trip of a lifetime.

This is the story of how we turned that promise into reality ‚Äî a vacation inspired by millionaires, but filled with something far more valuable: connection, gratitude, and adventure.

From private yachts to dream destinations, this journey is our thank you to someone who‚Äôs given so much to others. We hope it inspires you to show appreciation to the people who‚Äôve made a difference in your life.

Who are we? 
We believe life‚Äôs greatest moments and deepest connections exist outside your comfort zone.

title: BECOMING A MONK IN THAILAND FOR 24 HOURS
description:
While we were in Thailand back in May, we got the opportunity of a lifetime. The most venerable Thai monk, Phra Maha Vudhijaya Vajiramedhi, allowed us to spend a day with him and got TD to become a monk for 24 hours. He and everyone at the Center were beyond kind and welcoming and it'll definitely be an experience we'll never forget.

Thank you so much to:

Cherntawan International Meditation Center
https://www.facebook.com/Cherntawan-International-Meditation-Center-1745413115768419/

Master Monk: Phra Maha Vudhijaya Vajiramedhi

title: We Created A Matchmaking Business
description:
Thank you to Skillshare for sponsoring this video. The first 500 people that sign up get the first 2 months for free: https://skl.sh/yestheory13 don't miss out!

Ahhhh Finding love.... Probably one of the most common struggles we all face at some point in our life. Yet, as we've grown more connected online than ever before, a lot of people still struggle to make genuine connections with other people. Soooo that gave us an idea... What if we gave ourselves 3 days to throw a matchmaking event that would get 40 single people in the same room to push them to seek discomfort and get to know each other faster than they've gotten to know any stranger before? 

Thank you to our friends Esteban @realestebangast and Jackie @i.am.jackie for being the most amazing hosts. And thank you to Austin @austinkevitch for offering up his house for the vent

title: 24 Hours Underground Inside A Giant Gold Mine
description:

title: The Most Brutal Game Show on the Internet
description:
Thanks to our friends at Audible for sponsoring this crazy Game show experiment! Go to http://www.audible.com/yestheory or text yestheory to 500 500 to get one free audiobook, unlimited Audible originals and a 30-day free trial. Check out Matt's favorite audiobook rec at the end of the episode.

With everyone inside and together... we decided to start our own game show. Welcome... To the What Day Is It Again? Show! 3 different games. 1 hilarious correspondent... Here we go!

title: hardest video I've ever had to make
description:
Hello friends, it is with a heavy heart that I feel finally ready to open up and speak about what's really been going on in my family's life the last 2.5 years. I will let you watch the video for yourself to hear everything from my perspective. I have never shared anything so personal or painful before. I decided to do so now, to bridge a deep gap that I have felt for many years now, between what my life has been in the real world and what my life is on here. I know so many have gone through or are currently going through something similar, and I hope that creating a space where we can talk about this can help us all feel less alone. If you have experienced grief, loss or pain, and if you have the strength to do so, I would love it if this comment section could be filled with stories, love and support for one another. Life is confusing and painful, we need each other to make it through.

Staffan and I decided to record a podcast about this because there was so much more to say:
https://youtu.be/YsgarNrWGLI

title: 24 Hour INTENSE Military Challenge | Yes Theory
description:
Exclusive videos coming on Instagram soon: https://www.instagram.com/yestheory/

Thomas has two amazing military veteran friends. 1- Mikhail Venikov, the #1 ranger in the U.S. in 2006, Pro MMA fighter, SWAT team officer, deployed 3 times in Afghanistan and Iraq. 2- Roc Ryder, military veteran, airborne and overall survival badass. They took us on an epic 48 hour survival and military bootcamp. The first day was physically insane while for part 2 coming out next Sunday we learned how to survive in the wild...

Also, to the Americans out there, Happy Memorial Day! 

Mikhail now runs an amazing non-profit to help army veterans:
http://www.rangerroad.org/

Subscribe to our boy JAKE PAUL:
https://www.youtube.com/user/JakePaulProductions

Now here's a little note for all you beautiful people who read the description... You guys are seriously the best, we work so hard to make content that feels fresh and authentic and to see people actually caring about what we do is a blessing every day. Thank you for watching and keep an eye out for a big big announcement coming on Thursday...

title: Getting a Date Only Speaking Spanish (Guys vs. Girls)
description:
Skillshare free trial: http://skl.sh/yestheory2

While in Medellin, Colombia, we figured the guys should get really uncomfortable by having to get dates and a job, only speaking Spanish. The problem is that none of them speak Spanish very well. So, we got our local friend Steph to tag along and help them out. Let's just say, it wasn't very smooth. Yet when our two girl friends Miku and Lucy gave it a shot, it wasn't a different story. Let us know what you think!

Follow us on Instagram @yestheory for behind the scenes look at what we do :)

title: Proof Of Aliens On Earth // 72 hrs With UFO Whistleblower David Grusch Under Oath (Documentary)
description:
Thank you for watching and being here, and I hope we manage to spark your curiosity about the phenomenon. And deepen your empathy towards the humans who experienced it. This has been one of the greatest journeys of seeking discomfort I have ever embarked on. I hope you take some time to keep exploring, as I did three years ago. 

With love, Ammar Kandil.

title: Our $70,000 Experiment
description:
Head over to https://www.yestheory.com/documentary to watch The Lost Pyramid.

IT'S OUR BIGGEST PRODUCTION EVER! We've never undertaken such a massive film challenge ever in our lives before but it's truly been one of the most incredible experiences we've ever had telling a story.

Ammar has had this dream since he's been 5 years old and in this documentary, you will hear how we accomplish it together... But not how he had originally intended it.

We want to try a totally new way for us to release a piece of content to see if this could potentially be a way for us to tackle long-form videos that can compete with the scale of Netflix. We promise this will be worth your trust and we CAN'T FREAKING WAIT for you to see this.

Yes Theory are four friends from four different countries who constantly seek discomfort in order to grow. title: Flying Strangers for a Surprise Honeymoon!!
description:
The first 100 people to sign up to Blinkist with this link are going to get a 1-week free trial: http://blinkist.com/yestheory - you'll also get 20% off if you want a full membership!!

3 Book Recommendations:
‚Ä¢ Antifragile by Nassim Taleb
‚Ä¢ Willpower by Roy Baumeister
‚Ä¢ Ego Is The Enemy by Ryan Holiday

Peter and Jill are just recently engaged. We met them while we were out in Thailand and they were so much fun that we decided to pull a Yes Theory on them and kidnap them to give them the best honeymoon ever. Along the way, we thought we'd teach them what (little) we know about love, patience and persistence...all keys to a great marriage.

Also, big thank you to:
Baba Beach Club Phuket Hotel: @bababeachclub (Instagram)
Wann Issara: @wan.issara (Instagram)

It also turns out Jillian started her own YouTube channel but in Mandarin Chinese! If you speak Chinese or are curious, check her out at www.youtube.com/JJsays

Every Friday we send you a 1-minute read on what we've learned from starting a business, seeking discomfort, and living a more fulfilling life:  http://yestheory.com/newsletter

title: Will Smith... We challenge you.
description:
Will Smith's Youtube Channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCKuHFYu3smtrl2AwwMOXOlg

Will Smith...We challenge you to HELI BUNGEE JUMP!  You've been a positive and motivational role model for the past few decades and have inspired millions, including us, to work hard and face our fears head-on.  So as a token of our gratitude, we wanted to get you to face something that might scare you and take you Heli Bungee Jumping with us!  We have one of the best pilots in the U.S. on board and would love nothing more than to share such an amazing experience with you.

title: KIDNAPPING A SUBSCRIBER FOR 24 HOURS!!
description:
Yes Theory coffee is the best way to wake up in the morning ready to seek discomfort: https://www.fanofafan.co/products/yes-theory-holiday-coffee

While in a supermarket in Medellin, Colombia, we noticed someone staring at us pretty strangely, which turned out to be a viewer named Juan Pablo.  Instead of just taking a picture with him, we decided to kidnap him for 24 hours and take him on an epic adventure through the Colombian mountains.

Follow us on Instagram @yestheory for behind the scenes look at what we do :)

Subscribe to our newsletter to figure out our secrets, what we've learned and what we think you should know: www.yestheory.com/newsletter

All music from Epidemic Sound. You can get your free 30 day trial here: http://share.epidemicsound.com/wFFbr 

Who are we? 
Yes Theory are four friends from four different countries who constantly seek discomfort in order to grow. Ammar, Thomas, Matt and Derin met in Montreal, Canada in the summer of 2015 and bonded over their shared desire to live a life that challenged and excited them. Fast forward to a year later, the team is now based out of Los Angeles, making a show on Snapchat Discover.

title: 100 Days Of Sweat
description:
HOW TO SUBMIT TO BE IN THE 100 DAYS OF SWEAT VIDEO:

1. Film yourself on your 1st, 25th, 50th, 75th, and 100th day of sweat
2. Label the videos this way: DAY - COUNTRY - NAME (Example: DAY 1 - LOS ANGELES, USA - AMMAR)
3. Send your videos to https://www.dropbox.com/request/1KyqhIa0epCqPGvd5pa3

Text "I'm in" to 323-310-5420 to get updates from Ammar and Matt on #100daysofsweat

To look into the science of 100 days of sweat, our friend Tom from Aspect Science made a great video about it, check it out here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KDSRMa1wOtI

Now get out there and sweat!  Much love :)

title: The ULTIMATE ADULT SLEEPOVER (epic pillow fight) | Yes Theory
description:
FOLLOW US ON INSTAGRAM YO: https://www.instagram.com/yestheory/

A few weeks ago we hosted the ultimate adult sleepover. We invited over 50 of our friends to sleep at our house, have a crazy pillow fight and watch La La Land. To all the special ones reading the description, hi HOW YA DOIN? This is Thomas I thought I'd start dropping some personal notes for y'all who actually read this. We're actually super interested to get your ideas for the sleepover 2018, should we host it with all of you in a like a huge warehouse or something?? That could be cool. Anyways, have a good day :D

title: CROSSIN OFF AN 88-YEAR-OLD GRANDMA'S BUCKET LIST!!
description:
Ellie is an 88 year old superwoman. She started skiing when she was 33 years old and at the age of 82 had to give it up because of too many injuries. Ever since, her dream has been to get back on the slopes one last time. Luckily, our friends at Wish of a Lifetime heard Ellie's story and decided they'd help her achieve that goal. We were so lucky to have taken part in this adventure and want to thank our friends at Wish of a Lifetime a million times for inviting us along on this journey. 

Please please please go check out the incredible work they do to help elders live out their last wishes and get out of isolation: https://wishofalifetime.org/

If you wanna become involved with Wish of a Lifetime right now, here's what you can do LITERALLY tomorrow:

Tomorrow, February 14th, Wish of a lifetime's 5th annual CupidCrew movement will impact 20 thousand lives worldwide. CupidCrew is a movement that delivers thousands of roses to our elders around the world on Valentine‚Äôs Day. 

Join us in the fight against senior isolation tomorrow by delivering a rose to an elder in your community or by donating 14 dollars to the movement - bit.ly/2CjcwSg (if you want us to find out you did it just use the hashtag #CupidCrew and we'll make sure to check it out).

description:

This week only, with every purchase above $35, you'll get a FREE necklace from us, love and have a wonderful week.
